title: Tesla’s loss, not India: Ola's Bhavesh Aggarwal reacts to India-Elon Musk deal not moving forward
description: Ola CEO Bhavesh Aggrawal labeled Tesla's India exit a loss for Elon Musk amid India’s growing EV sector. Rajesh Kumar Singh noted Tesla's silence post-election. Musk canceled his April India visit to meet PM Modi, opting for China.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
